import sys
t=int(sys.stdin.readline())
while t:
    t-=1
    num=map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    itr=1
    for i in range(1,10):
        if num[itr]>num[i]:
            itr=i
    if num[itr]>num[0]:
        print 10**(num[0]+1)
    else:
        ar=[str(itr)]*(num[itr]+1)
        print ''.join(ar)
